representation_information.name: NetCDF-4 (Network Common Data Form, version 4)
representation_information.description: A platform-independent file format for storing scientific data, supporting annotated multidimensional arrays, hierarchical groups of data objects, user-defined data types, and features for enhanced performance, including support for parallel I/O, data compression, and chunked storage.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
